Transform your reading experience with the ShortDose Chrome Extension. Our extension allows you to instantly summarize articles and convert them into audio files, making it easier for you to consume content on the go.

Key Features:

- Instant Summaries: Quickly generate concise summaries of any article with just one click.
- Audio Conversion: Turn summarized articles into audio files, allowing you to listen instead of read.
- Multi-Language Support: Access summaries and audio in over 40 different languages, including various dialects.
- High-Quality Voice: Experience high-quality, natural-sounding voice for a pleasant listening experience.

Benefits for Users:

- Save Time: Get the gist of long articles in a fraction of the time it would take to read them.
- Enhance Productivity: Maximize your time by listening to summarized articles while multitasking.
- Flexible Learning: Stay informed and learn on the go, whether you're commuting, exercising, or doing household chores.
- Stay Updated: Keep up with the latest news and trends effortlessly with easy-to-access audio summaries.

Transform the way you consume information with the ShortDose Chrome Extension. Install now and start enjoying effortless learning and efficient content consumption.
